answerText: Amazing Fantasy[10] Amazing Fantasy was briefly revived in the 1990s for a series of stories set in Spider‐Man's early days by this comic book writer. This man was simultaneously the writer of Avengers and Iron Man at the turn of the millennium, and he created the Thunderbolts and Astro City.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 2 | 13 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This comic book series went fourteen issues trading in twist ending scifi plots, such as an alien invader who has amnesia and thinks he is a human. For 10 points each: [10] Name this comic book, which dropped the word "adult" from its title for its fifteenth and final issue, that shows a green‐jacketed hoodlum being held above New York by a character introduced in this comic, Spider‐Man.
